doc.title: My Insignificant Other
doc.plot: Chef Wendy Weinberg is cheated out of her house, car, money, and her own restaurant by Victoria...also known as her ex-lover. With nowhere else to go, Wendy (an exuberant puppy but a bit of a slob) shows up on the doorstep of her old lover, Mel McEnzie, a vegetarian, exercising, control freak of a hypochondriac. Can two ex lovers, complete opposites with nothing in common, live together without killing each other?
